creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: small round shallow bronze dish; silver inlaid organic design at center, surrounded by five stylized bats; silver inlaid curls around slightly raised lip; short round foot on bottom; navy blue cloth-covered storage box with a triangular bone toggle
inscription: Bottom of the dish: 石叟
markings:
bottom center, inlaid silver: Shisou mark;
paper label on bottom of box: Nicholas / Grindley / 0619-09
title: Silver inlaid bronze dish
